website_summaries.verdict: Great price point for a machine that offers 4 GB of RAM for fast processing results.
pros: Those who need a low-priced Chromebook will love this unit
Most of the laptop's components offer at least an average quality of performance, which is better than what you usually find in this price point
Above average battery life at 11 hours
cons: Only 16 GB of storage space in SSD

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this Chromebook! The keyboard is easy to use, and there is no external noise to contend with. All that was necessary for set up was turning it on and logging into google account, exactly as advertised! I use a computer, primarily for internet access and saving/posting photos. It is fantastic for the things that I need a computer for. Defiantly well worth the money & then some. I highly recommend the Samsung Chromebook for browsing the internet, and for note taking. I couldn't be happier with this product!
customer_reviews.author: SuzyQ

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: First time Chrome OS user, very streamlined and easy to use. Works great right out of the box, as advertised. Amazing battery life, I could go on. Would definitely recommend, especially at the current price.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Boyd

customer_reviews.title: slow and difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: This computer freezes constantly. I used it for literally one day and it froze at least a dozen times. It's also not easy to use. I am returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: SUPER STICKY KEYS on keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this for a month or so and the keys on the keyboard "stick" - i.e. i'm constantly making typing errors bc the space bar and shift key is very picky -- you have to hit it exactly the right place. Many of the key require A LOT of effort in your fingers to type correctly. That may be odd feedback but it's driving me mad -- and making my hand and neck hurt a ton too! Ugh. If it was still within the return window, I'd return it. I recommend continuing your search for an economical Chromebook elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Not willing to work with you...
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy it ti small no response writing to them. I even bough a two year service out over three hundred dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Carmen garica

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with NO OPERATING SYSTEM
customer_reviews.text: "Chrome OS is missing or damaged. Please insert recover USB stick or SD Card". This is what I see when I open my Samsung Chrome OS book for the very first time. Rock on, Samsung. Way to not impress me.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: I bought this in July. Now, in October ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in July. Now, in October, it has just frozen. I can't turn it off and the mouse does nothing...very frustrating and disappointing. I only use it for email, shopping and FB, but now I can't use it all.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca A Smith

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this chromebook to take on an extended trip. The screen is OK. The volume is OK. The battery life is great (9 hours) What I don't like is the hassel of trying to type as all of a sudden the cursor flies off to some other part of the script and thus types in between previously written text. Other times for no apparent reason it will deleat everything you just wrote. With just this short review it has happened four times. I would return this thing if i were not in India for the year. Don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: daniel

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson for his birthday. He loves it and it works very well. Thank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jones Little

customer_reviews.title: Reliable, lightweight, great for browsing
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight. Great for those who just browse the internet. Small and portable. Fast and reliable. Great for teens, college students and most of all, for parents. I bought this for my folks cause I want them to have the freedom to browse. This is perfect. Just what they needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Astr

customer_reviews.title: Quite Pleased So Far
customer_reviews.text: I just got mine the other day, & am still getting used to it, but at the moment I couldn't be happier, It will do everything I want it to do, & I couldn't care less about the things it won't do. I don't entirely care for the trackpad, which is why I'm only giving 4 stars, but I'm slowly getting used to it as well, & I can always go with a mouse instead. I would recommend this machine to anyone who wants an inexpensive web-content device.
customer_reviews.author: The Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Nice, I ordered this just for simple web browsing ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice, I ordered this just for simple web browsing and personal use. I wanted something simple and easy to use. This item is excellent and not bad for the price.
customer_reviews.author: RitaL

customer_reviews.title: NICE!
customer_reviews.text: This came as a free item along with the Samsung S9 I bought. I actually love it. It does everything you need a small laptop for. You won't be placing the latest high graphics games on it, but that is not what it is for. Only complaint is battery life seems to not be what might be expected in a laptop. Also, the keyboard skips a beat every so often. This has occurred with th "?" Mark key a couple of times. Will see if it continues. But it did not cost me anything, so why complain at this point.
customer_reviews.author: quadsforever

customer_reviews.title: works great so far
customer_reviews.text: works great so far. Word to the wise! There is NO CAPS LOCK! there's also another button missing but you'll get used to it. Works well for writing novels which is what I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi bowley

customer_reviews.title: Probably won't mess with ChromeOS again, but it's cute and incredibly lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This computer is good if you're a very low-maintenance web browser, but even then, I find it gets horribly slow much too quickly, even for 4GB RAM. This was my first experience with ChromeOS and will more than likely be my last, but I could see how it would be more than enough for a lot of people. Good gift idea for an older relative who goes online to read the news and such.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: turkey
customer_reviews.text: It started out great, but a week after I got it the operating system went haywire. A powerwash got it operating, but did not restore all functionality. I returned it for credit.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Putt

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Haven't even had this laptop for 9 months and have used it maybe once every 2 weeks and several of the keys have stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Okay but not great!!
customer_reviews.text: I had this since November 2017 and it has some flaws. The display is crappy when looking downward head-on and off axis,the sound quality is absolutely not the best for the $200 price point,very laggy when on some websites and very little storage with 16GB you only get 5-10GB left. But if your looking for this for Google Docs and Google Sheets it is totally use-able but the keyboard can be awkward at times.
customer_reviews.author: Jason S Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Struggles with the simplest of tasks.
customer_reviews.text: I've never owned a Chromebook before and I dont think I will ever buy another one. I purchased this so I could do work at home, but this little guy seems to struggle with simple tasks like editing Word documents or Excel spreadsheets. My two-year old Samsung tablet can handle more tasks than this Chromebook. I honestly don't know who this would be good for? I feel like it struggles to browse one website of simple text. The good news is that this is extremely lightweight so you can throw it pretty far when you get frustrated with it. Oh, and it's got a nice, long battery life
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! It is great and does everything I need it to do. I think what people forget or don't understand is that this is a Chromebook. It is limited in what it is capable of and is not the same as a full laptop. Please understand that before you buy it or I am sure you will be disappointed. I use it for my writing, watching videos, browsing social media, and occasionally chatting with friends. I have other computers that can do any heavy lifting that this can't. Having said all that I am very happy with this and would highly recommend it and would make the purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Wade

customer_reviews.title: This lap top runs off Chrome OS
customer_reviews.text: not meant to be used as a gaming lap top. it runs off chrome os so that means it is not set up at all like windows. all apps and tabs are on the bottom screen panel, there is no additional number lock keypad in the bottom right corner like you're Originally used to so no high expectations for a singular use lap top. Meant for single tasks such as school with bare minimum task preformance. Though i am impressed with the preformance of such a compact notebook.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: Great First Computer for an 8 Year Old
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my daughter's school work and it arrived in great shape. It is used and was listed in very good shape. Everything seems to work fine on the computer and it arrived in the original box, without any scratches or noticeable wear. If anything get weird with it in the coming weeks once she starts using it regularly, I'll be sure to update.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Deininger

customer_reviews.title: An absolute beast for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I'm a freelance writer and I needed a cheap, portable machine for typing and emailing. It does much more than that. It's got great speakers, so it's replaced my desktop as my go-to Netflix machine, and the keyboard has a nice, soft touch. If you're looking for a computer for web browsing, streaming media, email or basic office applications, I'd definitely recommend this device.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Toler

customer_reviews.title: Just a cheap flimsy tablet with a shoddy keyboard
customer_reviews.text: small, light and flimsy which i expected. the keys are sticking after light use after a year and the touch screen is non existent. does not easily transform into a tablet. also, google chromebook is terrible because most apps are only made for android /windows or apple and google is its own thing so its hard to get non-bootleg or knock off apps for some things. i would have been better off spending and extra 50-100 to get a refurbished actual laptop. also, keyboard doesnt have a caps lock button and i think ive shown that on my review since i am struggling to type on this as we speak.
customer_reviews.author: Nasha

customer_reviews.title: Look Elsewhere, Samsung Products getting worse
customer_reviews.text: Less than 6 months old, had to replace screen myself (Sent to warrant at 3.5 mos..not covered), now the operating system crashed and missing...absolute junk, and their tech support is useless! I'm glad I got this for my Mother at alow price, now they have gone up almost $100 more for the same junk because of the pandemic. Samsung made the Do Not Buy again list....done with their terrible products...same price get an HP...overall better ratings also
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Died - the cost of repair twice the cost of the chromebook
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoyed this Chromebook and used it for nearly all my computer work. Last night I shut it off only to discover that it would not power on this morning. Having tried all the known methods to get it working again, I contacted Samsung and was referred to their licensed repair facility. It needs a new mother board - that plus the labor is twice the cost of the unit. I will purchase another Chromebook, though not from Samsung.
customer_reviews.author: frdan44

customer_reviews.title: Amazing battery life, replaced my $800 laptop just fine
customer_reviews.text: My laptop died last year, so I've been tied to a desktop for awhile. I wanted something light that I could travel with and mostly use for streaming, internet, and some class work. This is perfect. It's crazy light, the battery lasts around 12 hours, it's fast, and doesn't stutter with as many chrome tabs open as you want (I've read reviews of other Chromebooks have trouble if you open more than about 5 tabs). A touch screen would be nice, but then you wouldn't get it for $169, so it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Alex C.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and nice Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: This chromebook is great. It does what it's suppose to. I bought it for my son for school and he really likes it. It has all the capabilities to do Google classroom and Google docs. It is good quality for the price. The screen is not the best, I think it blurs at certain angles for privacy when using it in class or public places. I bought it used and very good condition through Amazon warehouse deals I ended up saving like 60 -70 bucks that way. It came in perfect condition just the box had been previously opened. It came with the charger and a manual. I would buy it again for myself or as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: ASDMama

customer_reviews.title: Great little chrome book
customer_reviews.text: It is Samsung , A brand I have had success with, it does the job that a chrome book is supposed to do, and it was inexpensive. I keep a few chrome books laying around the house barn and garage. They come in very handy to check on the weather, order parts that I need to, check on how to repair some thing, or find Inspiration for designing something I have to build. I would wear a Chromebook watch if I could read it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Boot Up
customer_reviews.text: I got this for things like taxes and reading books and longer articles, things that are not the best or not doable on my phone. Since I’m retired, I don’t need much in a computer, and this Chromebook seemed to fit the bill: it did what I wanted and the price was good. However, I expected it to last a few years, not three months! Over the last month, since the return window closed, it has become more touchy, until now it never opens without first shutting down at least once. Right now, it’s sitting on my lap, and it refuses to boot up. I’m very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: SS

customer_reviews.title: charge and go right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cheap laptop and was swayed by online reviews to give the Chromebook a try. This was the easiest computer set up I have ever experienced. I opened the box, plugged the Chromebook in for about 30 minutes, hit the power button, logged into my Google account and that was it, set up was done. It is everything I need for computing on the couch that my phone can't do.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kadijevic

customer_reviews.title: Terrible keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this Chromebook. Good price. Adequate (but not great) display. Long battery life. But the keyboard just kills it for me. Somebody in the design group decided to increase the key spacing so that the keyboard fills the entire space. It's terrible. The keys are much further apart than on my ThinkPad and my multiple mechanical keyboards. Trying to hit backspace just gives me "=". I just can't manage to type on this thing. I wish I could find a good replacement for my old Asus Transformer tablet & keyboard. I was hoping a Chromebook would fill the bill, but I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Works great overall, but the charging cord doesn't "lock" in. Stops charging constantly due to this.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this as a Christmas gift for our 11 year old daughter. So far it's working great, and she just started being homeschooled and it's working out wonderfully for school work. One complaint ...the charging cord barely stays in the port and the slightest movement will cause the cord to not be charging the computer anymore. It's very very annoying. To think you are charging the chrome book and find out it hasn't charged at all because the cord shifted. The cord doesn't lock in at all. It feels like it barely stays in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THIS LISTING IS FOR REFURBISHED, False Advertisment!
customer_reviews.text: Wished I had read ALL of the reviews before purchasing. I could have paid less for a listing that lets me know the computer is refurbished. This does not specify that it is and I did not receive a NEW chrome book. Extremely disappointed. I may just return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great computer, but don't expect it to be something it's not
customer_reviews.text: I'm a 40 year old mom who wanted a small laptop for writing, and that's exactly what I got. It's perfect for my needs, small, light, and has decent battery life. I use it for streaming shows and movies, and browsing Pinterest, Instagram, and Twitter, and it also works perfect. My only complaint is the screen resolution gets pixelated when I try to zoom in when watching shows. I wouldn't think it's a good gaming computer, because if it was my 12 year old son would be begging to use it everyday. But, he doesn't, and I get it all to myself. If you want it for the basics, get this Chromebook, it's a good one.
customer_reviews.author: Mar

customer_reviews.title: Great tiny chromebook with all the features needed. 4.5/5
customer_reviews.text: I have this tiny chromebook for a week now and I have just charged it for 3 times, though I used it everyday of this week. So I must say it has an amazing battery life. Everything is fast enough, typing, browsing etc.. Trackpad is fine though sometimes it doesn't work for few seconds I dont know why. When I opened the box screen was dirty which is sad. The last and the most disappointing thing about this chromebook is that the speakers are really bad with its everything. Still I believe that this chromebook is a life saver for college students like me with its price point and portability.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This chromebook is awesome but not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: This chromebook is awesome but not for everyone. I work online using skype and buying this wans't a good choice for my work, the camera is awful and the appstore is not the best...Also using Microsoft word online is not as good as I thought. But if you're someone who just visit websites, listen music and basic things this is a great choice. Something that I liked is that you can download apps from Play Store like Instagram and It looks like the phone version. Not all apps are compatible with chromebook but as I said, for basic things this is okay. It's fast. I can say I'm 60% happy with this laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Mariangel

customer_reviews.title: Need to have a google account, android apps don't work on expandable storage.
customer_reviews.text: Great budget laptop. I needed a laptop for college and this proved to be a great choice. Its slim and fits into a case i bought easily it holds a long charge and charges fast. After starting it updated and allowed me to download android apps, which is great being you can play games or download other things not supported by chrome software. Sadly the android apps take up much space and I purchased a SD card but after trying to download android apps on SD card it did not work so it places a limit on how many apps you can have.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Sheets

customer_reviews.title: Really love Chromebook!
customer_reviews.text: Typically use an iPad at home. Purchased this specifically to create documents for a Bible study class. Set up easily for this user with little tech knowledge. Connected to my wireless printer. Chrome Store allows me to have apps and easy/quick access to some of my favorite idea (Pinterest, etc...) and reference sites (like Bible Gateway) and Amazon Prime Music app. App access means this would be suitable for someone who wants to surf the web or gamers or for entertainment, like Netflix. Google docs is so easy to use. Perfectly meets my needs at a very affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Very Slow - Slower than my Tab 8
customer_reviews.text: Very slow acting. Maybe all Chromebooks are like that, I don't know this is my first. I wanted a chromebook for traveling - I use Google Docs and Sheets extensively. It will do for now, but I expected a much faster device. Samsung Tab 8 is much faster.
customer_reviews.author: William A. Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Battery will not hold a charge
customer_reviews.text: I love the easy use of this product and every thing about it. BUT I have only had it 5 months and the battery will not charge.I do not use it on battery very often but even when I use it plugged into electric the battery is not charging. I am very disappointed in this product. I thought it would at least last the year.
customer_reviews.author: Patty McAdams

customer_reviews.title: would not recommend if you enjoy having a scroll bar
customer_reviews.text: I know it's a cheap (cheaper?) device but it's incredibly annoying that so many of the pages do not have a scrollbar and apparently they disabled or took away the extension/option that allows you to have it pop up automatically and not disappear. Mine is not a touchscreen so having a scrollbar is kind of important and it will randomly NOT show up on some pages which is frustrating. Everything I've googled as a fix is old and no longer works.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: great computer at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for an inexpensive Chromebook because I was really looking for web browsing and I was really tired of windows 10. I was going to return this item and order a larger screen but I thought I would give it a try. Great little computer that does what I need it to do, which was surf internet etc. Good price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: great little computer with a disappointing screen
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Doesn't slow down with multiple tabs open Nice keyboard great battery life seems well built Cons: mediocre screen. Not very bright. so-so viewing angles
customer_reviews.author: Aaron B

customer_reviews.title: A Great College Laptop - Especially for Liberal Arts' students
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Tough\Ultra Long Battery Life\ Stable\ Small but Powerful\ Works android app on it\ Unlimited google drive if you are a college student. \ Even can run Ubuntu as second system. Cons: Low-Resolution \ Mild Processor, Not for gamers \ Not that beautiful compare to MacBook The computer itself is in plastic, however in good quality. Plastic makes it tough. You don't need to worry about scratch and such staff. The processor is not strong however enough to work on essays and such staffs.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Guo

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Chromebook needing a cheap laptop replacement quickly. I wasn't sure what to expect from a Chromebook and read a lot of reviews before deciding on this one. I only need it for checking email, internet browsing, and other light computing tasks. It's a slight adjustment going from a traditional laptop to a Chromebook but I have enjoyed it so far. I can get everything done that I need to and it's quick doing it. Honestly, if you need something that is good for light computing this is a great option.
customer_reviews.author: SF

customer_reviews.title: This was a good cheap alternative
customer_reviews.text: I was very hesitant on making the jump to a Chrome OS from a windows laptop. But since I have really outgrown gaming, and mainly use the laptop for business documents and web surfing, in addition to google apps. This was a good cheap alternative. The biggest drawback is that it needs to be connected to the internet using wifi to be completely effective. But it's lightweight, responsive, and the ever growing app ecosystem, it's very easy to do what you want to.
customer_reviews.author: SoCal Hiker and ProspectorTop Contributor: Hiking

customer_reviews.title: It has it's own letter making and something like Excel, so I really haven't needed Windows 10 yet.
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had a computer for over 2 years and really didn't miss much. I thought this computer came with Windows 10, but it doesn't, but that's okay, because I really like what this can do. It has it's own Letter making and something like Excel. So it really is nice if you want something simple.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki from Florida

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Fee drawbacks but it's overall a good system.
customer_reviews.text: OS high performance and great speed. Love the item. Works great if you need to code etc. Greats- +Fast system/great OS operating system/system to go back and forth to code and if your a developer this is your computer for under $200. Crazy. -Weirs glictches that annoy me when I'm trying to turn on the computer/crashes sometimes/not enough storage and has small issues. summary. Good computer.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Lester

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for school
customer_reviews.text: I just needed a computer for school to do research and type up papers. If that's what you are looking for, this is the computer for you. If you are looking for a computer to store photos on and do a bunch of editing on, you will need more. For a school computer and studying though? This is perfect- I toss it in my backpack and write all my lab papers and pull all my books through on it and it's great to follow along in class with.
customer_reviews.author: J.Mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Had to send back
customer_reviews.text: I had to send this back. The keyboard doesn’t work, types BT instead of T and the letter U was messed up as well? Box it came in was pretty battered and the top of the laptop has a dent.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor whitlock

customer_reviews.title: WON'T CHARGE, CHARGER BROKE QUICKLY
customer_reviews.text: Whoever thought to use this charger was a complete fool. The chromebook charged up the first time we used it and then refused to charge after that. Then the charger tip broke the day after. Used another charger from a another samsung and that doesn't work either. Worst purchase we ever made. I am going to contact Amazon and see if we can return. Disgraceful.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Can barely have multiple internet tabs open without the computer taking forever to load anything. Very low volume levels with speakers that point straight down on the bottom of the computer for some reason. Had an older chrome book that worked great for what I use it for which is mainly just browsing the internet, watching YouTube, etc. I’m not sure how one that is 3 years newer than what I had and similar price has so much worse performance.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Tracy

customer_reviews.title: ugh....frustrating
customer_reviews.text: I’m sooooo disappointed. I received it yesterday. It looks really great. However, I can’t even charge it, because the adapter doesn’t even fit the chromebook. 😖
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Nice Small Note Book Chrome
customer_reviews.text: I had the old version of this notebook and it was to TIME to UPGRADE it and YES i got me the newer version it is FAST to check my e mails and YouTube the price is NICE AFFORDABLE and the color is nice also I had the silver and now I got the black notebook you wont regret it and if your package is being deliver by SLOW the brown one expect it around 7 pm or LATER the Post Office is FASTER
customer_reviews.author: edgar cardona

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life, cheap casing
customer_reviews.text: Considering what I paid, I guess I should feel happier about it. It has great battery life and charges really quickly a well. However, the case has that cheap plastic feel to it. On top of which, any pressure on the surface near the track pad translates to the processor as actual track pad activity, which means that occasionally the Chromebook acts like a possessed machine, jumping screens, opening and closing tabs, etc. Good for what I use it for, but nothing to write home about.
customer_reviews.author: azteclady

customer_reviews.title: Just a glorified tablet, not a laptop.
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase if you have windows compatible hardware, such as printers, that you will want to use with it because they are not compatible. I have very limited needs with a laptop but this could not meet them. I had to look up how to turn on capslock because the keyboard doesn't have a capslock button.
customer_reviews.author: Emily H.

customer_reviews.title: I LIKE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: I am 80 but was able to get going on it right away! Seems to be just what i need! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lynne L.

customer_reviews.title: Good little Chromebook.
customer_reviews.text: Initial review, will update after a few months: Liking this little Chromebook so far, paired a bluetooth mouse to it easily, and it's keyboard isn't bad at all. No fancy mechanical gaming keyboard, but it feels fairly durable. I usually use headphones with music, but tried out the speakers on this anyways and was pleasantly surprised. They're pretty good considering the cost of this Chromebook.
customer_reviews.author: Cat dad

customer_reviews.title: Happy go camper
customer_reviews.text: I just need something to do my work with. The product is very studios, professional and effective with allowing me to complete my task and get things done. I can add more memory and I can even upgrade the whole system to become a proficient product. The product runs slowly on WiFi but what I notice is it depends on the type of WiFi being used. The product is durable and handy as well as lightweight to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: My Opinion

customer_reviews.title: The screen sux
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I got bad one, but the screen is so much crappier than my old acer cb311 IPS. I can't find an angle where the blacks don't turn to blues and there's a noticeable gradient (light at the bottom to negative black at the top). Everything else seems fine. It's all plastic and has a dumb glossy bezel and the screen is terrible and I like my old one better but it's an ok piece of equipment I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Amy B

customer_reviews.title: Fast, dependable, insanely long battery life
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this little machine. The screen is easier to see in daylight than that of the Asus Chromebooks a couple of my kids have for school, and I like that it opens up completely flat -- so it's easy to see from any angle. I like the textured case, the battery life is incredible, and it just does everything I want it to do and does it well.
customer_reviews.author: A. Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Amazing overall great chromebook!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product of my new chromebook, this is my first chromebook but love it already and all it's features. Very fast, clean, easy to use an overall a great item to have or even a must have for anyone wanting a light fast laptop on the go or at home. I would definitely recommend this to anyone and not problems at all with it at all nothing is wrong with it. Thanks Amazon and deal arc!
customer_reviews.author: James Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great price and perfect for a student
customer_reviews.text: This is way cheaper than buying a laptop. I bought this as a gift for my son, for his classes. He already uses an Android and has Google Play and a Google account. So, this was an easy transition for him. He says the keyboard is a little "funky" but when I asked for more details-- I think it's just learning to work with a new keyboard. He is really happy with his Chromebook.
customer_reviews.author: Foodiewife

customer_reviews.title: Review Samsung Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: I like this chromebook, it's easy to hook up and because it only runs on chrome doesn't get too complicated. I am 72 yrs old and not really good with technology so it is a bit of learning curve for me. I would certainly recommend it. Edit: I am dissapointed that I can't do video calls on it. The camera only points to me and not the subject. Didn't realize this until recently.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Benny Slasberg

customer_reviews.title: After just 1.5 months strong white noise when using headphones
customer_reviews.text: My family has several chromebooks and we have been happy with the older ones. They are light, affordable and start up quickly. This one has major issues with sound after only 1.5 months of use at home. There is very strong "white noise", no matter what headphones I plug in. And all the headphones work just fine with other devices. So, it is not very useful just after the return window closed.
customer_reviews.author: obs

customer_reviews.title: Great little tablet!!!!!  It’s not much bigger than my iPad Air but I love that it has a keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: At first I was hesitant because it seemed too good to be true but I honestly can’t say a negative thing about this little Samsong! It is super light and easy to use. I was able to get mine going right out of the box and at this price I purchased a second one for my two-year-old to play on. If you are questioning whether to buy one or not, just go for it!
customer_reviews.author: A P

customer_reviews.title: Good Overall Tablet
customer_reviews.text: This tablet is great. Do not overly expect things from this tablet such as an oled display or super fast processing speed. However, the quality is great and the price adequately represents the product features. The speed is adequate and the picture is adequate for general browsing, paying Bill's, watching Netflix etc. I had a higher price Acer that completely quit due to motherboard issues and wanted another tablet that would do the basics This is a Samsung and they have great products.
customer_reviews.author: David Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great for students
customer_reviews.text: I kept reading about bloatware but I'm having no problems with memory. I'm an older college student so I'm not using this laptop for gaming and other nonschool stuff. I write papers, do homework and access Canvas with no problems. I can also do e-mail and watch videos and stuff on Facebook. Good basic laptop. It has Google Docs not MS Office so I've had to adapt but it's not a huge issue.
customer_reviews.author: Toadcrystal

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little computer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little computer, runs the internet very smoothly and has access to any word doc. needs. The only thing that I don't care for is that it is incapable of downloading many applications due to the fact that it runs on the chromebook operating system. Again, this is a great computer, but not if you need to download programs to do homework/office work.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Adequate device + low cost = great!
customer_reviews.text: It gets the job done. Speakers are pretty quiet so I have to use headphones when listening to most things. Took a little getting used to the file management, but that's just because I never had a chromebook before. Definitely good considering what you pay.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Originally, I purchased for my elderly mother to use while in the hospital recovering from heart surgery. Unfortunately, she passed away and I inherited the device. It's works well and meets all of my needs. I can play Pogo.com, browse the internet, read email, visit banking/business websites, etc. It's obviously not for heavy duty gaming or anything along those lines. I like that it's lightweight and not bulky. The battery lasts a good while.
customer_reviews.author: RetiredHsMom

customer_reviews.title: Th perfect first computer
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my Chromebook! To be perfectly honest this is my very 1st computer of any sorts other than my phone which is a Samsung Galaxy. Having knowlege of Google made this very easy for me o learn how to use. I have had nothing but positive experiences with Samsung products!
customer_reviews.author: beth

customer_reviews.title: Incredible value
customer_reviews.text: I am a MBP user for two decades and bought this Chromebook in order to install a software version of a utility I need at work. I am completely floored how great this system works, fast, ease of use the flawless Google app ecosystem integration and all this for $140. I feel like a sucker having shelled out 1200-2500 USD for Macs.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Bilar

customer_reviews.title: a perfect gift for elderly parents or grandparents !!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 84 year old mom who struggles to manage the computer. A laptop/desktop were too cumbersome and takes up too much space in her home. This is portable small and can easily be tucked away when she is finished. It is easy for her to use...very easy to set up and get her email which is why she wanted a computer!!! I enlarged the text and she now watches her soap operas and other shows. I also got her a wireless mouse which I highly recommend!! She now loves using the computer!
customer_reviews.author: carolyn91

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Chromebook specifically because of the antivirus capabilities. I am comfortable doing bank business on the Chromebook because after my instagram account was hacked from Moscow on my desktop computer, I lost confidence in my own antivirus. So, I needed another method of handling finances other than my desktop. I am extremely happy with the Chromebook. It is every thing I expected and more. I highly recommend the Chromebook.
customer_reviews.author: dmcorl

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop for surfing the internet
customer_reviews.text: This is a great laptop that is well built, light, and reliable. With the Chrome browser, I don't even miss my old windows laptop. As long as you access a good internet connection you should'nt have a problem easily surfing the Internet even with multiple browser tabs open.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for 3 months than half the screen when black... GARBAGE!
customer_reviews.text: My 12 yr old daughter received for this for Christmas and it was exactly what she wanted. It never left the house, was never dropped or banged around, and nothing was ever spilt on it. She basically only used it got School work and to watch You Tube and Netflix. Within 3 months, half of the screen turned black for no apparent reason. We haven’t been able to fix the problem or use it since. That was the 1 big item she wanted and it didn’t even make it until Easter!! VERY disappointing!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small chromebook is small, browses internet, costs $182
customer_reviews.text: Like other chromebooks, this one holds a charge, browses the internet, contains all of the letter keys, and allows the screen to be darker or brighter. Unlike other computers, it costs only one hundred and eighty-two dollars, and when my child spills juice on it I will only be out about half the price of most other chromebooks. Going strong after a year of daily use. Lightweight. Probably not good for people with large hands or who want to use this as a primary viewing device for television (quality is fine but screen is not as big as big chromebooks). Once I sat on it and it was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Hansen-Dewar

customer_reviews.title: so good. It seems like a good little laptop
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these for my twin 9 year olds for Christmas. We do not have a family computer and they need something for school. So far, so good. It seems like a good little laptop. It is definitely a bit smaller than a typical laptop but, perfect starter for kids!
customer_reviews.author: Cristina P.

customer_reviews.title: Great, and especially great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I absolutely love it. It's compact without being too small, screen resolution is great, and the volume of the speakers is nice. Very efficient and the price was wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: MeganTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: The only downside is that it can overload on video easily. I learned not to open a lot of ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after breaking my last Chromebook (totally my fault/the cat's fault). They are super-efficient and simple computers. I mostly use my computers for streaming, surfing and writing Word documents so I can't imagine spending more than this. The only downside is that it can overload on video easily. I learned not to open a lot of Youtube tabs or run 2 videos at the same time, which can lead to freezing.
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Laptop
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using this laptop for about a month but so far so good. I love that it's connected with my Google info on my phone so it's easy to share files and images. The battery lasts for such a long time, and it's light and compact. Perfect for my kids too use as well.
customer_reviews.author: PS20

customer_reviews.title: Now what?
customer_reviews.text: After hours-long online chats and fewer than six times of use, the Samsung Chromebook 3 is just dead. No reponse after filing a "complaint ticket." So... now what?
customer_reviews.author: Barbinkent

customer_reviews.title: Endurable
customer_reviews.text: I've had this laptop for a little over a year, and it rarely fails me. I've dropped it several times, and there's barely a scratch on it. As is expected for a Chromebook, you can really only do stuff on the web, but there are extensions. And for the decently low price, it's a good deal. My only complaint would be that the keys seem to get stiff and fall off somewhat easily, but I have had it for over a year.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: but it is lightweight and has good image clarity
customer_reviews.text: With the11.6" diagonal screen it seem much smaller than my standard laptop, but it is lightweight and has good image clarity...Still learning Chrome software which seems simpler than Microsoft..Just wanted a unit that was basic and easy to operate...
customer_reviews.author: Orley

customer_reviews.title: I've had it less than a week and I love it! Yes
customer_reviews.text: I was going back and forth with purchasing a laptop. I was only needing something for internet and basic use. I thought it was going to be too small so I didn't get my hopes up. I've had it less than a week and I love it! Yes, the screen is small, but I was pleasantly surprised that the keyboard is pretty regular size. I'm still figuring how to use it, but I love the simplicity. I give it 5 stars for a simple, everyday laptop!
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The lid on this thing has been broken for most of the time my wife has owned it. The hinges inside are very cheap and weak. The thing will not close because the hinges are broken on it, Also you cannot print easily form it. I bought my wife a standard laptop so she could print her coupons to the printer. This Chromebook is not a good product in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: IFOUNDWHATIWANT

customer_reviews.title: Great basic laptop!
customer_reviews.text: Great little laptop for basic needs! My husband has an HP Omen for photo editing and things like that, I was just looking for something small to surf the web and respond to emails. This is perfect. I've only used it for a few evenings, but so far it's well worth it's reasonable price tag!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Very nice chromebook
customer_reviews.text: This is my first chromebook and I really, really like it. i am not technologically savvy, and it was very easy to set up and use right away. It is compact and lightweight and charges quickly. The only drawback for me so far is the smaller screen, which is no fault of the product. I should have done a bit more research before purchasing. Overall, very pleased with it and would make a great computer for a student or someone who travels.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Miller

customer_reviews.title: Happy Purhase
customer_reviews.text: My old Chromebook was getting old and this is a replacement. Glad I did. This new one is better. Five year old electronics generally have a better new edition.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to start writing novels on. I have never used a Chromebook before, so I was kind of disappointed that I couldn't use Word, and I can't download a lot of what a regular computer will let you do, but I quickly got over that. Google Docs works just as good, and I recently got an update that added Google Play. The font is quite small on the screen, though. But a plus side is it has its own virus protection. It is also not as big as a regular laptop. It is the perfect size for me. All in all, I love it and I am glad I ran across this.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole W.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for student
customer_reviews.text: This is a great option and great value for a student - bought this to replace the school-issued Chromebook for our high school son. It has a little more memory and few more features than our older basic model so this was a nice option and great value for the money. So far it's working great!
customer_reviews.author: KMM

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy to use but very fragile charger.
customer_reviews.text: Quick. Small. Easy to use as a backup laptop when you need something quick and portable. Only problem is the charger is the size of a toothpick. I’ve had this laptop all of a week and I already dropped it while charging and broke the charger. Seriously? Who thought this was a good idea. Nothing wrong with the seller or delivery, just the product is sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with This Lappy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect little laptop for travel or home use. Love how quickly the Chrome operating system starts up. Camera is great for video conferencing. The RAM isn't high enough to do intense graphic design, but it will do graphic based document editing well enough.
customer_reviews.author: Salamandrea

customer_reviews.title: so far, so good
customer_reviews.text: When my son's PC crashed heading into finals week, this was a quick, easy, workable solution for him. Virtually no set-up, lightweight and easy to stow in the backpack, and small enough to easily use in the classroom for note taking. He was able to get online, read his online textbooks, complete, and submit assignments via his university's portal with no issues. I don't know how long it will last, but it's doing the job we need it to do for now.
customer_reviews.author: Hall Ways

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered and tried out 6 different laptops before finally settling on this one. Runs fast and has a long battery life. It didn't shatter when my dog knocked it off of the bed and jumped down on it either, so that's a plus. It doesn't have a touch screen or the tablet mode where you can bend the screen all the way around, but I think that's kinda dumb anyway so I don't care. This little guy is pretty good all around. 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Brandilache

customer_reviews.title: My new travel buddy!
customer_reviews.text: Compact, extremely light and portable. This is the ideal travel buddy if you just need to keep in touch and be able to conduct virtual transactions on the go. It is a fast little machine, and even though it is tied to Google Chrome, it is not as limiting as I thought it would be. Connects to internet anywhere, allows me to stream video and audio content with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Our family recommends this if you prefer one that isn't touchscreen.
customer_reviews.text: I have an Asus Flip Chromebook. My husband did not want a touchscreen, so we ordered this one for him. He loves it. It's a wonderful little machine. He likes that you can see it, the display is clear, and it's easy to use. (by the way, I love my Asus Flip - also available on Amazon).
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi Ammons

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these for my kids to use during homeschool. The screens are extremely grainy but everything else seems fine. Runs well for our needs. What can I say...you get what you pay for. I definitely wouldn’t recommend these for daily use. Spend a bit more for better quality!
customer_reviews.author: jmb
